extendedInfo.description: Challenge yourself with more than 250 professional US style crossword puzzles. It is easy to use and fun. Play anywhere - coffee break, at home, on the bus or in the park.- Great user experience- Designed to support phones and  tablets- More than 250 professional casual-level crosswords suitable for all- Pinch zooming puzzle grid- Clue list view- Answer checking, cheats and  highlight mistakes- Your answers are saved, Resume button to get you to the last puzzle you were playing.- Preferences (highlight mistakes, grey out completed clues, jump letters, etc)- US style, with no hanging letter like New York Times (NYT),

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: easy to use, good options, like it.
reviews.author: Monique Williams

reviews.title: Great app..fun using dis app..
reviews.comment: One shd try dis app...smartly n precisely develped.
reviews.author: Vijay Bansal

reviews.title: Cool and fun
reviews.comment: Easy to play. Nice UI. Good brain teaser.
reviews.author: Isabella smith

reviews.title: Must have app
reviews.comment: A vey nice interface.puzzal your brain yet do not frurstate very smooth interface and logical thought design..i wud recomend a must have app.
reviews.author: KP Singh

reviews.title: Great app, fun to play, works well
reviews.comment: This game is really fun with with a good user interface, an excellent crossword puzzle application. Many wonderfull puzzles.
reviews.author: Sanjay Singh

reviews.title: Excellent n a challenging app
reviews.comment: Its easy to install n play but tough to crack and makes you to think a lot. It could be a great fun specially during travel. Overall superb!
reviews.author: Ajeet Singh

reviews.title: Suspicious pop-ups...
reviews.comment: Note to developer: While I understand free apps are ad supported, this app\'s ad content consists of suspicious pop-ups that resemble malware ads...like ones that say \"your phone\'s security is at risk\".  I completed one puzzle and got solicited for a \"chat\" and two misleading security risk pop-ups...and then immediately deleted the app...
reviews.author: Gregg Kubert

reviews.title: Unwanted ads
reviews.comment: Puts ads in notifications and puts ad apps on home screen. Unacceptable. Do not download this spamware crap.
reviews.author: Mike Soucie

reviews.title: Nice crossword app
reviews.comment: Wish I was better at them, guess practice is in order
reviews.author: Jerry Proctor
